Folders
----------------------
01-configuration_datasets   Original used datasets for model configuration
02-spatial_index            Spatial index for spatial explicit diffusion
03-load_profiles            Load profiles of technologies
04-census_data              Census data to disaggregate industrial fuel
05-dwelling_stock_related   Dwelling stock related assumptions for virtual dwelling stock
06-fuels                    Fuel inputs for all submodels
07-switches                 Scenaric fuel switches
08-technologies             Technologies to configuration_datasets
09-??
